data.title: Profitable Fox Trapping by Jim Helfrich (book) Trapping ~ Books ~ Fox Books
data.meta_description: Profitable Fox Trapping by Jim Helfrich (book). "This book is the result of many years of learning, trying, testing and developing.  It is a "system-lesson" book, rather than just a "method" book.  Nothing has been left out, and everything is told as it is.  Some of what is in this book, you may already know.  Fine, that allows you to concentrate on the other portions.  All of the ideas presented here are not all mine.  Some were learned from other trappers, some from other writers...
data.text:
AuSable Brand Rotating Fox & Raccoon Grapple / Drags Trap 1/4" - Made in the U.S.A.

Price: From $2.49 to $23.95

AuSable Brand drags have the ability to spin like that of a propeller on a boat, making it easier for the drag to get tangled up on brush quicker than standard drags. The drag measures 7.5" long and 8" wide. Drags work great in sandy or loose soil.

AuSable Brand Standard Blade D-Handle Trowel Made in the USA

Price: $23.95

Quantity:

* Whole number only

28" Standard Blade D-Handle Trowel - Powder Coated Orange 3" Wide Blade

AuSable Brand Trap Anchor Cable Stakes Available with 15", 20" & 30" Cable Attached Dozen Made in the USA

Price: From $18.95 to $21.95

AuSableÂ® Brand Trap Anchor Cable Stakes Available with 15", 20" & 30" Cable Attached. AuSable Trap Anchor Cable Stakes are perfect for trapping everything from coon to coyote.

AuSable Magnum Driver 24" T-Handle - Works on AuSable, Dirt Dog & Wolf Fang Type Earth Anchors Made in the USA

Price: $16.95

Quantity:

* Whole number only

The Magnum AuSable Driver will fit both the AuSable Earth Anchors as well as the Wolf Fang Stake Ends.

Bulldog Stake Puller - for pulling cable stakes and rerod stakes

Price: $39.95

Quantity:

* Whole number only

Your stakes can be pulled and reused with this tool. Long handle gives you the leverage you need to get the stake out with ease.

PcsOutdoors Canine Trapping DVD with John Chagnon

Price: $29.95

Quantity:

* Whole number only

Trapper John Chagnon takes you through the wilds of upstate Michigan trapping elusive wild canines. This DVD covers all canines including Red Fox, Grey Fox and Coyote. This video is intended to show every facet of trapping canines efficiently in a down to

PcsOutdoors Skinning and Fur Handling DVD with John Chagnon and Dave Cronk

Price: $29.95

Quantity:

* Whole number only

PcsOutdoors and J&K Fur Exchange bring you an extensive 2 hour DVD on the topic of skinning and fur handling. John Chagnon is your host as we take you from the trapline to the sale of fur, covering all aspects of fur handling.

PcsOutdoors Water Trapping DVD with John Chagnon

Price: $29.95

Quantity:

* Whole number only

Deep in the heart of Michigan, John Chagnon takes you a water trapping adventure. While trapping inland waters and the mighty AuSable river, John explores the proper techniques and methods for harvesting aquatic furbearers. Covers: Beaver Otter Muskr
